columns.name: personId
columns.description: Used to join to people dimension

columns.name: partitionDate
columns.description: Represents apply date of transaction - use to join to date dimension

columns.name: signedOffSwt
columns.description: Indicates that timecard is signed off for the date of the transaction ** Do Not Use this value is not available or inaccurate **

columns.name: amountType
columns.description: Indicates if the pay code unit type of the amount paid was hours, money, or days

columns.name: wages
columns.description: Wage amount for totalized transaction

columns.name: hoursAmount
columns.description: Hours amount for totalized transaction

columns.name: daysAmount
columns.description: Days amount for totalized transaction

columns.name: combinedPayCodeSwt
columns.description: Indicates if amount is associated with a combined pay code

columns.name: payCode
columns.description: Name of the pay code transactions are charged to - joins to pay code dimension

columns.name: payCodeId
columns.description: Unique identifier of a pay code. Joins to pay code dimension

columns.name: wageMultiplier
columns.description: Indicates pay code multiplier of hours times base wage - 1 is regular, 1.5 is premium pay, etc

columns.name: payPeriodWeek
columns.description: ** Do Not Use this value is not available or inaccurate **

columns.name: payPeriodNumber
columns.description: ** Do Not Use this value is not available or inaccurate **

columns.name: laborTransferSwt
columns.description: Indicates if the transaction has a labortransfer

columns.name: wageAddition
columns.description: Pay code wage addition amount

columns.name: orgTransferSwt
columns.description: Indicates if transaction has a business structure transfer

columns.name: orgId
columns.description: Unique ID of Business Structure location - joins to Business Structure Dimension

columns.name: isFromCorrection
columns.description: Indicates if the transaction is from a historical correction

columns.name: costCenterId
columns.description: Unique Identifier for a CostCenter joins to costCenter dimension

columns.name: laborEntryName1
columns.description: Labor Category 1 entry name associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer) Note: after DH Release 8.1 only view will have this value

columns.name: laborEntryName2
columns.description: Labor Category 2 entry name associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer) Note: after DH Release 8.1 only view will have this value

columns.name: laborEntryName3
columns.description: Labor Category 3 entry name associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer) Note: after DH Release 8.1 only view will have this value

columns.name: laborEntryName4
columns.description: Labor Category 4 entry name associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer) Note: after DH Release 8.1 only view will have this value

columns.name: laborEntryName5
columns.description: Labor Category 5 entry name associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer) Note: after DH Release 8.1 only view will have this value

columns.name: laborEntryName6
columns.description: Labor Category 6 entry name associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer) Note: after DH Release 8.1 only view will have this value

columns.name: laborEntryDesc1
columns.description: Labor Category 1 entry description associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer)

columns.name: laborEntryDesc2
columns.description: Labor Category 2 entry description associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer)

columns.name: laborEntryDesc3
columns.description: Labor Category 3 entry description associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer)

columns.name: laborEntryDesc4
columns.description: Labor Category 4 entry description associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer)

columns.name: laborEntryDesc5
columns.description: Labor Category 5 entry description associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer)

columns.name: laborEntryDesc6
columns.description: Labor Category 6 entry description associated with transaction (applies to labor category transfer)

columns.name: uniqueId
columns.description: Unique identifier

columns.name: updateDtm
columns.description: The UTC date/time stamp of when the row was inserted or updated in BigQuery

columns.name: costCenter
columns.description: Cost Center name
